column1: I've been making real progress on the issues that matter: ☑️ Covid-19 relief for people and small businesses ☑️ Reducing the high cost of prescription drugs ☑️ Fighting for better forest management The election is 4 days away! Find your ballot drop site: https://t.co/SPZBWeC7fu

Amid predictions of our toughest week in the Covid-19 pandemic it is important that Oregonians stay safe and help one another. With everyone doing their part we’ll get through this together. https://t.co/oq4yksuSqE
